name: Malibu™-Bailey's Colada
author: Amy C
summary: A friend's mom made this on a hot summer day after she got back from a cruise. It's one of the best pina colada drinks I've ever had.
ingredients: ½ cup Irish cream liqueur (such as Baileys®)
½ cup coconut-flavored rum (such as Malibu®)
directions: Mix the Irish cream liqueur, rum, pineapple juice, and cream of coconut together in a large pitcher
Pour 1/2 cup into a blender container
Add the ice cubes and blend to desired consistency
Pour the ice mixture into two glasses, dividing equally, and fill with the remaining rum mixture
